Direct Known Subclasses:
SFUnitTestSuiteImpl
public abstract class AbstractTestSuite
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.workflow.conditional.ConditionCompound
implements TestSuite

This is an abstract base class for test suites. Its key feature is that it provides a thread local context variable that can be used to retrieve the current context of a running test. Because it extends ConditionCompound, it has the event workflow lifecycle, and the created 10-Oct-2006 11:39:29

flattenStringList

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> flattenStringList(java.util.List src,
                                                          java.lang.String name)
                                                   throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
flatten a string list, validating type as we go. recurses as much as we need to. At its most efficient if no flattening is needed.

Parameters:
src - source list
name - name of the list, for reporting errors
Returns:
a flatter list
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogInitException - if there is an element that is not of the right type
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
